entry.title: bitcoin.org missing bitcoin core version 22.0
entry.summary: A user named Prayank expressed confusion over the existence of two websites that represent Bitcoin Core. Another user clarified that there is only one website which represents Bitcoin Core full node implementation and provided a link to download Bitcoin Core from https://bitcoincore.org.The first user also pointed out that Wladimir, who used to sign releases, is no longer doing so as of version 22.0. The user expressed concern about the replacement signers in their GPG network and the combination of changes happening at the same time with high security stakes.
